gdi.game.dominion.DominionTile

Package
Description
gdi.game.dominion
All classes supporting the Dominion game

  • Uses of DominionTile in gdi.game.dominion

    Methods in gdi.game.dominion that return DominionTile
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    DominionTile[]
    DominionTileManagerInterface.getColumn(int col)
    Returns all DominionTile instances stored in a given column.
    DominionTile
    DominionTileManagerInterface.getTile(int col, int row)
    Returns the DominionTile at the specified column and row in the map (not pixel coordinates!)
    DominionTile
    Figure.getTile()
    Returns the DominionTile below the figure.
    Methods in gdi.game.dominion with parameters of type DominionTile
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    DominionInterface.clickedTile(DominionTile tile)
    Automatically called by BaseGame when the player clicked on a DominionTile with the mouse.
    If the player figure is not walking currently, this method has the player walk to the passed DominionTile.
    void
    Figure.moveTo(DominionTile tile)
    Lets the figure walk to the given DominionTile.
